<div class="card-header">IEEE GHTC 2023 <a href="https://ieeeghtc.org/" target="_blank" title="IEEE GHTC 2023"> [Click on link]</a> 
</div>
<img class="card-img-top" src="/images/IEEE-GHTC2023.png" alt="Card image top">
<div class="card-body">            
<h5 class="card-title"> Exciting conference announcement! </h5>
<p class="card-text">The 13th IEEE Global Humanitarian Technology Conference (IEEE GHTC 2023) is a flagship international conference sharing practical technology-enabled solutions supporting achievement of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) by addressing the needs of underserved communities in resource-constrained environments around the world. </p>
<p>GHTC 2023 will be hosted at Villanova University (Pennsylvania) on October 12-15.</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 d-inline-block" style="max-width: 20rem;">
<!--- <div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3" style="max-width: 18rem;"> --->
<div class="card-header">TinyML in Internet of Things (IoT) devices by Harsha Yelchuri</a> 
</div>
<!---<img class="card-img-top" src="/images/IEEE-GHTC2023.png" alt="Card image top"> --->
<div class="card-body">            
<h5 class="card-title"> GW Coders meet-up </h5>
<p class="card-text">Harsha Yelchuri is a student at the Indian Institute of Science where he studies approaches to implementing machine learning on microprocessors and Internet of Things (IoT) devices. In November of 2022, he published a preprint review of research on TinyML, which he will be presenting at the GW Coders meetup on February 17th at 12:00 noon (ET). We record each presentation and those are available after the meet-ups on YouTube.</p>
<p>Date: Feb 17, 2023 </p> 
<p>Venue: In person in SEH 2600 @12pm (pizza provided) or join on zoom <a href="https://go.gwu.edu/gwcoderszoom" style="color:blue;" target="_blank" title="GW Coders meet-up talk"> here</a></p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3 d-inline-block" style="max-width: 20rem;">

</div>

<h5 class="card-title"> Exciting conference announcement! </h5>
<p class="card-text">FOR YOU. BY YOU. GRIMMCon 0x8 will feature presenters on one inclusive track for the first time! Our theme is Inclusion & our partner is #ShareTheMicInCyber.
MAY 18 | 11 AM - 7 PM (ET) | FREE | VIRTUAL</p>
<p>Deadline: Feb 23rd, 2023<a href="https://form.jotform.com/223466835678067" style="color:blue;" target="_blank"> Call for papers</a></p>
</div>
